skillTree.localised_description: As if on clouds, the Patriarch's horse moves swifter as the wind and faster as the light.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

skillTree.localised_description: With the power of foresight the Magister Patriarch moves so swift he appears as if doubled, making him inviolable for any foe.

effects.description: Ability: "Azyr's Image"

skillTree.localised_description: It is certainly for these reasons that Azyr's Magisters are known for their great preference for sky and star gazing, and for this reason the Magisters of the Celestial College are called "Celestial Wizards" or even sometimes "Blue Wizards".

effects.description: Research rate: +10%

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: One of the most rare artifacts currently owned by the Celestial Order is the Ring of Azyr, a famed artifact said to hold immense magical power. Any who wields it is fabled to be as light as a feather and has the abbility to move as fast as the winds itself. It is made from solid gold with a rare blue gem attached to it, as if bound by magic. The origins of the gem are non-traceable and radiate a sky blue aura, a mesmerizing sight to any.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(all units in army)
Ability: "Ring of Azyr"

item_set.name: Channeler of the Blue Winds
item_set.description: Magister Julevno is the present day Magister Patriarch to the Celestial Order of the Empire. He was born in Nuln, the son of an actress and (or so his mother thinks) a mercenary from somewhere in Ostland. Julevno never once saw his father as he was growing up, nor, for that matter, did his mother. Julevno was twelve years old when he started to have visions, flashes of things that would then happen hours, days, and even weeks later. By his fifteenth year these visions came to him constantly in such a blur that his mother thought him mad. It is a testament to the boy's strength of mind that he was not.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment: Celestial Wizard

items.colour_text: His natural affinity for Azyr, the Blue Wind, was truly exceptional. Although Raphael sees visions of the future in his head without even needing to gaze into the heavens or use equipment, his true talent shines phenomenally when using his personal telescope. It is rumoured among the Order that Julevno has the ability to channel the essence of the clouds and stars when using his famed stargazer, leaving students both frightened, eager and hesitant to gaze through it's glowing scope.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance: +15%
Ability: "Julevno's Stargazer"

Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(all units in army)

item_set.name: Channeler of the Blue Winds
item_set.description: Magister Julevno is the present day Magister Patriarch to the Celestial Order of the Empire. He was born in Nuln, the son of an actress and (or so his mother thinks) a mercenary from somewhere in Ostland. Julevno never once saw his father as he was growing up, nor, for that matter, did his mother. Julevno was twelve years old when he started to have visions, flashes of things that would then happen hours, days, and even weeks later. By his fifteenth year these visions came to him constantly in such a blur that his mother thought him mad. It is a testament to the boy's strength of mind that he was not.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment: Celestial Wizard

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Raphael's natural affinity for Azyr, the Blue Wind, is truly exceptional. He sees visions of the future in his head without even needing to gaze into the heavens or use any equipment at all.
